title: Traning Mode
description1: Flashcards are a simple but effective tool for learning kana characters. Start with the basic kana characters and later on expand to others, the system will mix for you the order each time.
description2: Once you get confidet with Kana Recognition try the other modes to increase your retention. Regular review is key to learning all the kanas.

results.title: Results {{correctResponses}} of {{numberOfQuestions}}
results.subtitleBelow50: Try going back to the Charts section for more practice.
